turkish_example_sentence: Biz lezzetli tatlı pastayı alırsak, partide herkes mutlu olacak.
english_example_sentence: If we take the delicious sweet cake, everyone will be happy at the party.
russian_example_sentence: Если мы возьмем вкусный сладкий торт, все будут счастливы на вечеринке.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz lezzetli tatlı pastayı ______, partide herkes mutlu olacak.
